human.en_US: Search the GitHub repository to retrieve the open source projects you need
human.ja_JP: Search the GitHub repository to retrieve the open source projects you need
human.zh_Hans: 搜索GitHub仓库，检索你需要的开源项目。
human.pt_BR: Pesquise o repositório do GitHub para recuperar os projetos de código aberto necessários.

description.llm: A tool when you wants to search for popular warehouses or open source projects for any keyword. format query condition like "keywords+language:js", language can be other dev languages.

parameters.name: query

human_description.en_US: You want to find the project development language, keywords, For example. Find 10 Python developed PDF document parsing projects.
human_description.ja_JP: You want to find the project development language, keywords, For example. Find 10 Python developed PDF document parsing projects.
human_description.zh_Hans: 你想要找的项目开发语言、关键字，如：找10个Python开发的PDF文档解析项目。
human_description.pt_BR: Você deseja encontrar a linguagem de desenvolvimento do projeto, palavras-chave, Por exemplo. Encontre 10 projetos de análise de documentos PDF desenvolvidos em Python.

parameters.llm_description: The query of you want to search, format query condition like "keywords+language:js", language can be other dev languages.

parameters.name: top_n

human_description.en_US: Number of records returned by sorting based on stars. 5 is returned by default.
human_description.ja_JP: Number of records returned by sorting based on stars. 5 is returned by default.
human_description.zh_Hans: 基于stars排序返回的记录数, 默认返回5条。
human_description.pt_BR: Número de registros retornados por classificação com base em estrelas. 5 é retornado por padrão.

parameters.llm_description: Extract the first N records from the returned result.

human.en_US: Merge a pull request in a GitHub repository
human.ja_JP: Merge a pull request in a GitHub repository
human.pt_BR: Mesclar um pull request em um repositório do GitHub

description.llm: A tool to merge a pull request with options for merge method (merge, squash, or rebase) and commit message

parameters.name: owner

human_description.en_US: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.
human_description.ja_JP: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.
human_description.zh_Hans: 仓库的账户所有者。名称不区分大小写。
human_description.pt_BR: O proprietário da conta do repositório. O nome não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas.

parameters.llm_description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo

human_description.en_US: The name of the repository without the .git extension. The name is not case sensitive.
human_description.ja_JP: The name of the repository without the .git extension. The name is not case sensitive.
human_description.zh_Hans: 仓库名称不带.git扩展名。名称不区分大小写。
human_description.pt_BR: O nome do repositório sem a extensão .git. O nome não diferencia maiúsculas de minúsculas.

parameters.llm_description: The name of the repository without the .git extension. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: pull_number

human_description.en_US: The number that identifies the pull request.
human_description.ja_JP: The number that identifies the pull request.
human_description.pt_BR: O número que identifica o pull request.

parameters.llm_description: The number that identifies the pull request.

parameters.name: merge_method

human_description.en_US: The merge method to use. Can be merge, squash, or rebase.
human_description.ja_JP: The merge method to use. Can be merge, squash, or rebase.
human_description.zh_Hans: 合并方法。可以是 merge、squash 或 rebase。
human_description.pt_BR: O método de mesclagem a ser usado. Pode ser merge, squash ou rebase.

parameters.llm_description: The merge method to use: 'merge' creates a merge commit, 'squash' squashes all commits into one, 'rebase' rebases commits onto the base branch.

parameters.name: commit_title

human_description.en_US: Title for the automatic merge commit message.
human_description.ja_JP: Title for the automatic merge commit message.
human_description.pt_BR: Título para a mensagem do commit de mesclagem automática.

parameters.llm_description: Title for the automatic merge commit message. If not provided, GitHub will generate a default title.

parameters.name: commit_message

human_description.en_US: Extra detail to append to automatic commit message.
human_description.ja_JP: Extra detail to append to automatic commit message.
human_description.zh_Hans: 附加到合并提交消息的额外详情。
human_description.pt_BR: Detalhe extra para anexar à mensagem de commit automática.

parameters.llm_description: Extra detail to append to automatic commit message.

parameters.name: sha

human_description.en_US: SHA that pull request head must match to allow merge.
human_description.ja_JP: SHA that pull request head must match to allow merge.
human_description.zh_Hans: PR头部必须匹配的SHA值才能允许合并。
human_description.pt_BR: SHA que o head do pull request deve corresponder para permitir a mesclagem.

parameters.llm_description: SHA that pull request head must match to allow merge. This is used to prevent merging if the PR has been updated since you last checked.
